name: Pride and Prejudice
desc: A timeless romance novel by Jane Austen, exploring themes of love and social standing.

name: Jane Eyre
desc: A gothic romance novel by Charlotte Brontë, following the life of the orphaned Jane Eyre.

name: Persuasion
desc: A romantic novel by Jane Austen about second chances and enduring love.

name: Wuthering Heights
desc: An intense tale of love and revenge by Emily Brontë, set on the Yorkshire moors.

name: Emma
desc: A lighthearted romantic comedy by Jane Austen, centered around the matchmaking Emma Woodhouse.

name: North and South
desc: A romance and social novel by Elizabeth Gaskell, depicting love across class divides.
